articles.title: Rising K-pop stars introduce themselves at Mnet Asian Music Awards - Associated Press
articles.description: K-pop stars Aespa, ITZY and NCT 127 wave a warm welcome from the red carpet at the MAMAs in Paju, South Korea. (Dec. 13)Subscribe for more Breaking News: htt...

articles.title: PH secures fresh $250-M loan to procure more COVID vaccines - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Philippine government is set to receive $250 million in new loans from the Asian Development Bank (ADB) to further finance its COVID-19 vaccine procurement.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, December 13) The Philippine government is set to receive $250 million in new loans from the Asian Development Bank (ADB) to further finance its COVID-19 vaccine procure… [+962 chars]
